content:
davis California

A winter clothing drive organized by the Chancellors Undergraduate Advisory Board CUAB will take place this week on campus PERIOD

Students can donate new or gently used winter clothing until Feb PERIOD  PERIOD

Items that can be donated include coats scarves gloves etc PERIOD

Four collection stations are available at the ARC and Student Community Center lobbies the Memorial Union near the Guest Services desk and at the Silo PERIOD

All items collected will go to The Pantry for distribution PERIOD

 Muna Sadek

Save my name email and website in this browser for the next time I comment PERIOD

title: News in Brief: Winter clothing drive organized - The Aggie
name: University of California Davis
